pages.title: Northern Base
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Saber (2020, TV show)$(br2)Spawns in the $(l:saber/dimensions/northern_base)Northern Base dimension$(/l)$(br2)Includes a $(l:misc/blocks/machine_blocks#sword_of_logos_book_analyzer)Sword of Logos Book Analyzer$(/l)$(br2)Chest loot:$(li)3-7 $(l:saber/items/blank_wonder_ride_book)Blank Wonder Ride Books$(/l) (25%)$(li)0.4 $(l:saber/items/blank_wonder_world_story_wonder_ride_book)Blank Wonder World Story Wonder Ride Books$(/l) (25%)$(li)4-6 books (12.5%)$(li)1 feather (7.5%)$(li)1 $(l:saber/items/wonder_ride_books#daishougun_momoichirou_wonder_ride_book)Daishougun Momoichirou Wonder Ride Book$(/l) (7.5%)$(li)1 $(l:saber/items/wonder_ride_books#daikengou_urashimajirou_wonder_ride_book)Daikengou Urashimajirou Wonder Ride Book$(/l) (7.5%)$(li)1 $(l:saber/items/wonder_ride_books#daiyokozuna_kinzaburou_wonder_ride_book)Daiyokozuna Kinzaburou Wonder Ride Book$(/l) (7.5%)$(li)1 $(l:saber/arsenal/book_gate_wonder_ride_book)Book Gate Wonder Ride Book$(/l) (7.5%)
